p: Had lovely trip here - are settled now in Tourist Camp (Capital - Highway 66 Tourist Camp) as living accomodations are almost ungettable here now.

Did show here at 11:30 Then did barre. Are now getting ready for last show at 2:30. Well have 3 shows tomorrow. this is a very nice club - large well lighted floors, good orchestra (a bit new tonight, however unused to our music) Wish us luck - as we do you & George Leon Dancers.
